title: Collaborative Design Between Basic Science and Clinical Educators for Integrated Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in medical education design or expertise in basic/clinical medicine
context.additional_context: Composed of mixed teams of educators from diverse backgrounds, conducting project-based learning in a real-time collaborative environment with BYOD (Bring Your Own Device).

learning_goals: Participants can explain a process for designing integrated educational materials that combines basic science and clinical knowledge using boundary-crossing strategies.
Learners can execute at least two efficient communication protocols (e.g., meeting structures, document sharing) while respecting team members' differing expertise.
Learners can validate the feasibility of integrated educational materials developed through project-based assessment using peer feedback and rubric criteria.

resources: Real-Time Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
